meanings.definition: To turn or rotate the hand or foot so that the palm or sole faces upward or outward.
meanings.sent1: She supinates her hand to show the palm.
meanings.sent2: Remember to supinate your foot when doing this stretch.
meanings.sent3: The yoga instructor joked that only cats can supinate their paws with such grace.
meanings.sent4: His storytelling skills supinate mundane events into captivating tales.
meanings.sent5: The magician's trick involved a quick supination of his wrist, leaving the audience amazed.
